page.title: 17ADULT LEISURE TIME IN BUDE
page.content: Most adults tend to spend much of their spare time at home gardening and reading. Many adults tend to be middle/old aged and are too old for taking part in sports. Since the area is isolated from{Bude,}people find it difficult or costly to travel frequently into town. As a result, many people develop their own interests at home - e.g. Mr Walsworth at Brookled enjoys being an amateur radio-ham. However some people travel into Bude to play at the tennis, golf, and badmington clubs.Other people keep their own horses at livery at one of the many local stables such as{ {Broomhill.}The area lends itself to horse-riding since there is much open countryside. For entertainment people have to travel to {Plymouth}for the theatre, and{Bude}for the cinema.
